meanings.definition: Two or more people who jointly hold a lease or property.
meanings.sent1: The cotenants shared the apartment and split the rent equally.
meanings.sent2: The cotenants signed the lease together to rent the house.
meanings.sent3: The cotenants decided to play a game to determine who gets the bigger room.
meanings.sent4: Being cotenants was like being roommates with legal responsibilities.
meanings.sent5: The cotenants were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together in their shared space.

meanings.definition: The act of holding property jointly with others.
meanings.sent1: Cotenants must agree on how to maintain the shared property.
meanings.sent2: The cotenants discussed the division of responsibilities for the land.
meanings.sent3: The cotenants organized a fun picnic on their jointly owned land.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship as cotenants was like a well-choreographed dance of property management.
meanings.sent5: The cotenants' bond was strengthened through their shared ownership of the beautiful estate.
